channel.title: React on Ola John
channel.description: Recent content in React on Ola John

item.title: The 20% Of ES6 you end up using 80% of the time - Let & Const.
item.description: Varibale declaration with let & const This is the first part in the series. I will be covering the other sections in part 2. One of the more confusing part of learning a Javasript framework as a newbie is that everything looks like magic at first. You are unsure which part of the code is some abracadabra or just plain Javascript.At least this was my feeling when I started learning React.
